name: Dodge It!
description:
Hello, let me introduce myself, my name is Samuel Crevier and I am 21 years old. I live in Canada in a city called Granby in Quebec. I created Dodge It! myself without the help of anyone. I just wanted to say to those who will download my game a big THANK YOU!



In this game you will need to collect the most black circle without being touch by the red circle if you touch them you will die instantly! every time you collect a black circle a new red circle appears. Move to left with the key A and right with the key D. To start the game or jump press SPACEBAR. When you die you can upload your score by pressing the leaderboard button but only the best can be on the top!
